name: Dwarves
declaringWar: Your lands will soon be mine, prepare for war!
attacked: Have you declared war on us? This was a huge mistake on your part, prepare to be destroyed!
defeated: You have destroyed our once great civilization. History will not look kindly upon you.
introduction: Greetings, stranger! I am Forge Master of the Dwarves. Gaze in awe on the majesty that is our great civilization!
hateHello: You again! What did you want?
tradeRequest: Well, how is my proposal to you?
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Happiness, +1 Culture, +1 Production] from every [Mountain]
All newly-trained [All] units [in capital] receive the [Home Sweet Home] promotion

name: Solarium Empire
startIntroPart1: Hailing from a distant world much closer to their sun, this advanced alien race takes mana directly from the stars they worship to fuel their magitech engines.
startIntroPart2: A single crashed colony shio, you must now attempt to thrive on this planet. either re-establish contact with your Empire, or conquer this world in poetry or plasma.

uniqueName: Brilliant Power from Beyond the Stars
